content: this spider web halloween decor is stunning and spooky for your high style halloween decorations this crochet cobweb is designed to brighten up any wall door window or table this is cute and spooky decor makes a wonderful accent for a home or garden can be used a halloween decor as a party decoration wall hanging decor or photo props in home and outdoor you can choose dimensions and colors add spiders dimension appr 3-4 inch/7-9 cm long tails at the ends of the garland to be easily hung skill level easy + possible for beginners materials ★ 2 5-3 mm crochet hook★ yarn black white red or any other color ★ stitch markers or pieces of yarn of a different color to mark the stitch ★ stuffing★ needle★ beads for eyes or plastic toy eyes you can make eyes out of yarn
